text: Anne Heche and James Tupper have gone their separate ways after more than 10 years together, Us Weekly confirms. During their time together, the pair welcomed son Atlas, 8, in 2009. According to court documents obtained by Us, the actress, 48, has filed a petition to establish custody and child support. Heche is seeking joint custody and “ reasonable visitation ” rights for both parents and is also asking that Tupper, 52, pay her legal fees during the court battle. The former couple first met when they costarred in the ABC series Men in Trees in 2006, while she was married to ex - husband Coleman Laffoon.
